overview: The film tells the story of the mental struggles of Reghuram, a health inspector. He is worried about all the terrorist attacks and starts the habit of collecting newspaper cuttings that contain any news related to it. This changes him as a pogonophobic. Raghuram mistakenly identifies Hyder, a young Madrasa teacher as a terrorist. This incident turns Hyder’s life upside down.
title: Kafir
